addition[source]

addition(a:int, b:int)

Performs addition of a and b

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(addition(2,3), 5)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(_subtraction(2,3), -1)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

multiplication[source]

multiplication(a:int, b:int)

Performs multiplication of a and b

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def multiplication(a:int, b:int) -> int:
    """
    Performs multiplication of `a` and `b`
    """
    return a * b
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(multiplication(2,3), 6)
{% endraw %}
